title: Handheld PC Logotype
content:
I’m currently working on some packaging, and feel the product name is worth a nice logotype. I’m thinking something very simple, San Serif Display. Something like NeoSans? Any suggestions welcome.

 [‹ Typography t-shirts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19019 "Go to previous forum topic") [Interesting flash/typography site ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: markduk

comments.content:
oh definitely ... without knowing anything about the product, style, business, objective, structure or strategy we are the best judges ... naturally.

**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210846/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
I hear that Myriad is great for selling personal electronics.
Alright smarty pants (Ratbaggy). Ask nicely or don’t post.
